message.body: Hi, No performance tonight. Gallery will close around 6 unless there is an unexpected crowd. Big days are expected to be sat. and Sun.
Please send wilson and maya scheduled times for the performances so they can post them in the gallery and on the web. C.
I'm sorry for any confusion I may have caused about performance times. I thought Fri. night was going to be good but I see now that an audience is not expected that night. C.
Peter Hopkins and the ArtHelix staff recommend that all prep. for performances (ballon refill, etc.) be finished by noon saturday. They expect an early start to the day. C.
Did you know that Wilson misconstrued Melanie's email and she's there doing the performance now? I haven't been able to get ahold of my performers to tell them.
Yes, I know about it. I don't expect much traffic at all tonight. Activities with galleries seem to really be happening during the day sat and sun.
Are you going to have a performance tomorrow, Sunday?
No, they have to go back to Philly
We couldnt turn your piece off. I turned the sound down as low as I could on all the knobs but couldnt turn it all yhe way off.

It's ok. I couldn't make it back in time to plug it in and hide the costumes from the party tonight. There's not still a key floating around, is there? I might come by during the party to do that stuff if the party means it's open.
We covered it with a tarp. Put the costumes on the dance floor to hide them. Turned all the volume knobs on low and backed the fused
Fuses out so no one can turn
My key is in midtown manhattan
Wow, thank you. That sounds thorough and just fine for tonight. No need for a key.
